com.metreeca.rest.wrappers

Class Processor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metreeca.rest.wrappers.Processor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Wrapper

    public final class Processor
extends Object
implements Wrapper
    RDF processor.

    Process RDF payloads for incoming request and outgoing responses and executes SPARQL Update post-processing scripts.

    If the incoming request is not safe, wrapped handlers are executed inside a single transaction on the system graph database, which is automatically committed on successful response or rolled back otherwise.

    • Method Detail

      • rdf

        public static <T extends Message<T>> BiFunction<T,Model,Model> rdf(String rdf)
                                                            throws RDFParseException
        Creates a message processing filter for inserting static RDF content.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the processed message
        Parameters:
        rdf - the RDF content to be inserted in the processed message; parsed using as base the focus item of the processed message
        Returns:
        the new message processing filter
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if rdf is null
        RDFParseException - if rdf is malformed

      • pre

        public Processor pre(BiFunction<Request,Model,Model> filter)
        Inserts a request RDF pre-processing filter.

        The filter is chained after previously inserted pre-processing filters and executed on incoming requests and their RDF payload, if one is present, or ignored, otherwise.

        If the request includes a shape, the filtered model is trimmed to remove statements outside the allowed shape envelope.

        Parameters:
        filter - the request RDF pre-processing filter to be inserted; takes as argument an incoming request and its RDF payload and must return a non null filtered RDF model
        Returns:
        this processor
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if filter is null

      • post

        public Processor post(BiFunction<Response,Model,Model> filter)
        Inserts a response RDF post-processing filter.

        The filter is chained after previously inserted post-processing filters and executed on successful outgoing responses and their RDF payload, if one is present, or ignored, otherwise.

        If the response includes a shape, the filtered model is trimmed to remove statements outside the allowed shape envelope.

        Parameters:
        filter - the response RDF post-processing filter to be inserted; takes as argument a successful outgoing response and its RDF payload and must return a non null filtered RDF model
        Returns:
        this processor
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if filter is null

      • sync

        public Processor sync(String script)
        Inserts a SPARQL Update housekeeping script.

        The script is executed on the shared graph tool on successful request processing by wrapped handlers and before applying post-processing filters, with the following pre-defined bindings:

        variable value
        this the value of the response focus item
        stem the namespace of the IRI bound to the this variable
        name the local name of the IRI bound to the this variable
        user the IRI identifying the user submitting the request
        time an xsd:dateTime literal representing the current system time with millisecond precision
        Parameters:
        script - the SPARQL Update housekeeping script to be executed by this processor on successful request processing; empty scripts are ignored
        Returns:
        this processor
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if script is null

      • wrap

        public Handler wrap(Handler handler)
        Description copied from interface: Wrapper
        Wraps a handler.
        Specified by:
        wrap in interface Wrapper
        Parameters:
        handler - the handler to be wrapped
        Returns:
        the combined handler obtained by wrapping this wrapper around handler
